snippet.title: VIVIDERIE TRAILER (New Bullet Hell Roguelike)
snippet.description:
WISHLIST VIVIDERIE ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1769200/Vividerie

Join the Vividerie Discord Server: https://discord.gg/R7GE7qEAw2

Vividerie is a hard bullet hell roguelike that has you shoot, dash and magic your way through hordes of vile creatures.
Fight your way through the dungeons, unearth powerful relics, and find yummy burger.

*Tough, Precise Action*
Vividerie is designed for those who crave a difficult game;
No mistake goes unpunished, but great feats are rewarded just as much.
Master complex mechanics, learn to dodge overwhelming patterns, and brew ridiculous builds.

*Roguelike Adventuring*
No two runs are ever the same, with 3 dungeons (More coming soon!) and fresh layouts every time.
Find special rooms that drastically alter the course of your adventure, and find secrets within their cracks.

*Wild Synergies*
Discover over 100 items and combine them in myriads of ways to wreak havoc upon your foes.
Figure out ridiculous amalgamations of stat modifiers, effects, and proc-chains that can make or break a run.

Music used "Yubi Breaker" by Reek/Asatsumei: https://soundcloud.com/reek_wobs/yubi-breaker-fc-cyaitical-miss-2

#vividerie #gametrailers #roguelike #gamedev #indiegame
